mapper.update: update mf_xs set status = 1,ckuserid=#{ckuserid},cksj=now() where lsh = #{lsh} and status = 0
update mf_xs set status = 9,ckuserid=#{ckuserid},cksj=now() where lsh = #{lsh} and status = 0
update mf_xs set status = 10,revert_info = #{revertInfo} where lsh = #{lsh} and status = 1

update mf_xs set hh=#{hh},sl=#{sl},lx=#{lx},province=#{province},city=#{city}, district=#{district},location=#{location},phone=#{phone},contact=#{contact},remark=#{remark}, qwsj=#{qwsj} where lsh = #{lsh} and status = 0
update mf_xs set status = '2', psdh = #{psdh}, driver_code = #{driver}, path_code = #{path} where lsh = #{lsh} and status = '1'
update mf_xs set status = '1', psdh = null, driver_code = null, path_code = null where psdh = #{lsh} and status = '2'
update mf_xs set status= '1',psdh = null, driver_code = null, path_code = null where lsh=#{lsh}
update mf_xs set status = '3',sdsj=now() where lsh=#{lsh} and status = '2'
update mf_xs set sdpic_url = #{sdpicUrl} where lsh=#{lsh}
mapper.select: select b.id, b.lsh , b.hh, b.sl, b.lx, b.province, b.city, b.district, concat(ifnull(b.province,''),' ',ifnull(b.city,''),' ',ifnull(b.district,''),' ',ifnull(b.location,'')) as location, b.phone, b.contact, b.qwsj, b.lrid, b.lrusername, b.truename, a.status, case b.lx when 0 then '正常' when 1 then '样机' when 2 then '赠品' when 3 then '残次' end as lxInfo, b.driver_code as driverCode, b.path_code as pathCode, b.store_code as storeCode,e.store_name as storeName, b.storage_code as storageCode,f.store_name as storageName, b.lrsj, b.cksj, b.zfsj, b.pcsj, b.fcsj, b.sdsj, c.pinm,c.xingh,c.tm,b.remark, case a.status when 0 then '配送中' when 1 then '已送达' when 2 then '未送达' end as statusInfo, b.remarks_wd as remarksWd,b.remarks_pl as remarksPl From mf_ps_mx a left join mf_xs b on a.ddh = b.lsh left join mf_sp c on b.hh=c.hh left join mf_store e on b.store_code = e.store_code left join mf_store f on b.storage_code = f.store_code where a.lsh = #{lsh}

select b.id, b.lsh, b.hh, b.sl, b.lx, b.province, b.city, b.district, concat(ifnull(b.province,''),' ',ifnull(b.city,''),' ',ifnull(b.district,''),' ',ifnull(b.location,'')) as location, b.phone, b.contact, b.qwsj, b.lrid, b.lrusername, b.truename, a.status, case b.lx when 0 then '正常' when 1 then '样机' when 2 then '赠品' when 3 then '残次' end as lxInfo, b.driver_code as driverCode, b.path_code as pathCode, b.store_code as storeCode,e.store_name as storeName, b.storage_code as storageCode,f.store_name as storageName, b.lrsj, b.cksj, b.zfsj, b.pcsj, b.fcsj, b.sdsj, c.pinm,c.xingh,c.tm,b.remark, case a.status when 0 then '配送中' when 1 then '已送达' when 2 then '未送达' end as statusInfo, b.remarks_wd as remarksWd,b.remarks_pl as remarksPl From mf_psrk_mx a left join mf_xs b on a.ddh = b.lsh left join mf_sp c on b.hh=c.hh left join mf_store e on b.store_code = e.store_code left join mf_store f on b.storage_code = f.store_code where a.lsh = #{lsh}

select lsh, lrid, truename, status, lrsj, hh, pinm, sl, lx,province,city,district, concat(ifnull(province,''),' ',ifnull(city,''),' ',ifnull(district,''),' ',ifnull(location,'')) as location, phone, contact, qwsj, sdsj,xingh,tm,remark,picUrl,sdpicUrl,billNumber,ckusername, case status when 0 then '新增' when 1 then '已提交' when 2 then '已派车' when 3 then '已送达' when 9 then '已作废' when 10 then '已撤销' end as statusInfo, store_code as storeCode,store_name as storename,storage_code as storageCode,storage_name as storageName, dept_code as deptCode,dept_name as deptName,driver_name as driverName,driver_phone as driverPhone, remarks_pl as remarksPl,remarks_wd as remarksWd from vw_xs where lsh = #{lsh}
select distinct province from mf_district order by 1;
select distinct province,city from mf_district where province=#{province} order by 1,2;
select province,city,district from mf_district where city=#{city} order by id;
select count(*) from mf_xs where status != 9 and bill_number = #{billNumber}
